name: 55 Cancri e
description: A 'Super-Earth' that orbits its star in just 18 hours and may have a surface of molten lava.

name: TRAPPIST-1e
description: An Earth-sized planet in the habitable zone of an ultra-cool dwarf star, part of a system with seven rocky planets.

name: Kepler-186f
description: The first Earth-sized planet discovered in the habitable zone of another star, often called Earth's 'cousin'.

name: HD 189733b
description: A 'Hot Jupiter' known for its deep blue color, caused by a rain of molten glass whipping through its atmosphere.
